full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,KLU GNYAN NAG PO GDON GROL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI SKYABS MGON DAM PA DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA CHUNG BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN MING CAN GYIS, 'DI YI GZHUNG DU BDAG NYID PADMA DRAG PO RTZAL, ,'JAM PA'I CHA BYAD 'JIGS PAR BSGOMS, ,SPYAN DRANGS BZHUGS GSOL BYA PHYAG MCHOD, ,BSTOD DANG 'DZAB BZLAS TSOGS MCHOD 'BUL, ,KLU BDUD 'DIR YANG SPYAN DRANGS LA, ,MDOS CHEN 'DI LA BSTIMS PAR BYA, NAD PA'I PHYAG 'TSAL ZHU GSOL GDAB, ,BSHAGS PA BYA ZHING 'GYOD 'TSANG BYA, PHYIN CHAD MI BYA DAM BCAS 'BUL, ,SA RIN RDO RIN 'BRU SNA BSHOR, ,RNAM 'JOMS GZUNGS CHUS KHRUS BYA ZHING, ,BYAMS SRUNGS PHYIR DANG BSKRAD PA DANG, ,ZHAGS GROL BYA ZHES GZUNGS PAS RIGS 'GRE NAS, ,TSAD MA'I SKYES BU DAM PA RNAMS KYI GSUNGS LAS BSNAN TE BSGRIGS PA'O, ,)
